projects.name: Technovity
projects.description: Official website for AISG-46's ATL fest Technovity 2020.

projects.name: Portraits
projects.description: Generates random portraits on different name inputs.

projects.name: Piamo
projects.description: A simple web-based piano that can be played using the keyboard or mouse.

projects.name: Impro
projects.description: Impro creates custom profiles for artists/creators to showcase their work. They can add their project's images and write their bio. There is also and option to add a profile pic. The platform also supports updation of data.

projects.name: Eduport
projects.description: A platform made for Amihacks, a hackathon organised by Amity University, Noida. It is a LMS platform for small tuitions and coaching centres to maintain records of students such as attendance, marks or to upload assignments, tests.

projects.name: Movie Logger
projects.description: Project made in Summer Horizon tech bootcamp organized at AISG-46 where I taught web development to the students of junior school. You can add movies to the list and also delete them. It also has a search feature.

projects.name: Muvi API
projects.description: (Open Source Contribution) A chrome extension to download movies directly from a Google search.

projects.name: Bharat Mystery App
projects.description: Bharat Mystery, which is a VR (Virtual Reality) based mobile application made using Flutter, accompanied by a physical board game that enables the user to explore the various cultural and historical tourist destinations of India. It also encompasses various economic aspects through the promotion of local souvenir shops.

projects.name: Covizab
projects.description: A single-page static website redesigning and redefining the vaccine for Covid-19.

projects.name: Tedx@AISG46 2020
projects.description: The official website for TedxYouth@AISG46 2020, a TEDx event organized by Amity International School, Sector-46. The website was made using HTML, CSS, and JS.

projects.name: Baatcheet
projects.description: Baatcheet creates appointments for people with bad mental health(Users) with people who want to listen to them (Therapists) along with a google meet link and the addition of an event to the user's and the therapist's google calendar. It also has a chillzone controlled by voice commands which suggests movies, shows quotes and memes.

projects.name: Local Party
projects.description: A website where you can create rooms and chat while watching local video files synchronized with your friends. It uses Socket.io for real-time communication and synchronization of the videos.

projects.name: Codr
projects.description: Codr will allow users to create new projects of varying technologies, view older projects, and search for projects using a specific command for each technology. It uses CSV files instead of a SQL database to reduce external dependencies.

projects.name: Nibble
projects.description: Nibble is a sleek and efficient link shortener designed to simplify your online sharing experience. With Nibble, cumbersome URLs are condensed into concise, memorable links, perfect for social media posts, emails, and messages.

projects.name: Tulip Socials
projects.description: A simple social media app made during the Tulip coding bootcamp organized by me. It has features like posting, liking, commenting, and notifications.

projects.name: Symbot
projects.description: A Discord bot that can transcribe audio files to text in seconds. It used Symbl.AI to transcribe the audio files. It also has features like summarizing the text, and generating a transcript.

projects.name: DSCI-100
projects.description: This project analyzes the impact of globalization on health, particularly angiographic disease. Utilizing k-nearest neighbors, it predicts chest pain types, enhancing healthcare diagnosis and treatment strategies.

projects.name: Classyfi
projects.description: Classyfi, as the name suggests, is a classy web app and a one-stop solution for finding study groups in real time. It shows all the live study groups on an interactive Google Map through which we can navigate to the location and join the group. Created using Google Maps API, Google Geocoding API, Google Place Autocomplete API, Google Authentication API, Moment.js, MongoDB Atlas, Express.js, and EJS. Created for nwHacks 2023.

projects.name: MoneyMinded
projects.description: MoneyMinded makes learning financial literacy fun and engaging in an interactive manner. Learn various topics via courses, quizzes and games which would make you earn virtual currency after completing each course. This virtual currency can be used to invest in dummy stocks which are based on real life stock market share prices and thus helping them learn basics of investment.

projects.name: TravoAI
projects.description: Your virtual travel companion that curates personalized itineraries, suggests hidden gems, and optimizes your journey for an unforgettable adventure. It uses ChatGPT's completion API to generate the itineraries. Created for Stormhacks 2023.

projects.name: SuperT3
projects.description: SuperT3 is the ultimate tic-tac-toe, or to be particular, a nested tic-tac-toe game. Just like the original game, it also has a 3x3 grid of empty squares but with a little twist - all the 9 squares have their own 3x3 grid nested inside them. Made in Java, it has a GUI and a multiplayer mode with saving and loading features. Created for CPSC 210 at UBC.

projects.name: Cybercongress Platform
projects.description: The official paltform of Cybercongress at Amity-46. It has some interesting sections where you can see the latest instagram posts (coming from the Official Instagram API), read our newsletter or submit a report. We are always here to help you.

projects.name: PrepWork
projects.description: A Chrome extension that lets you access answers to the questions of WebWork by creating a community of students who can help each other out. It also has a feature to add questions and answers.

projects.name: ByeClicker
projects.description: A Chrome extension that automates iClicker attendance and poll responses. It seamlessly joins sessions, selects majority answers, and runs discreetly in the background, freeing you to focus on other tasks. From attending class to catching up on rest, ByeClicker has you covered. It has over 350 users from all over the world.

projects.name: Portfolio Website (Old)
projects.description: My lovely old portfolio website. It was made using HTML, CSS, and JS. It has various animations, dark mode, and is fully responsive.

projects.name: Portfolio Website (New)
projects.description: My new portfolio website made using React, React-3-fiber, and ThreeJS. It has a 3D model of a laptop in which the main websites lives. The website has an interactive 3D room depicting my interests and hobbies. It also has a dark mode.

projects.name: Encryptid '21
projects.description: The platform for Encryptid 2021, built with Express. Encryptid 2021 featured a revolutionary new format that was similar to stock trading.

projects.name: Rollertoaster
projects.description: rollertoaster is a gamified discord bot that helps effectively and efficiently assign tasks based on discord roles and keeps a track of all the work done.

projects.name: OompaGG
projects.description: Our solution to this is OompaGG, a mobile web app that will automate the verification of certain tasks performed. Along with that, we are gamifying the whole process to incentivise them to complete the maximum number of tasks by providing rewards on their completion.
